name: Phonegap-start
body:
### Irish Rail / Phone Gap demo app.

This is just a dummy/demo app for using phone gap.
XML feeds are proxied through the yahoo YQL service (mainly just to get around the cross domain issues).
Uses [jQuery DataTables](http://www.datatables.net/) for display.
Still a little slow and a few bugs, but proof of concept is there.

Use the QR Code below to download & test for real.

![QR Code to demo the app in action ](https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?chs=116x116&cht=qr&chl=http://build.phonegap.com/apps/202385/install/?qr_key=vTqeNSNuTZ4ygp5iaTY1&chld=L|1&choe=UTF-8)


### Authors
http://symbollix.org/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
